title: Last call: pick up Apple's M4 Pro Mac mini for $1,279
description: Time is running out to pick up Apple's M4 Pro Mac mini at the discounted price of $1,279.Get exclusive pricing on Apple's M4 Pro Mac mini.This Mac mini is a top seller due to its blend of affordability with the performance of the M4 Pro chip. Featuring a 12-core CPU and 16-core GPU, this retail model also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage. Normally $1,399, B&H is knocking $120 off the upgraded configuration (MCX44LL/A) exclusively for AppleInsider readers.Get the exclusive deal Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Time is running out to pick up Apple's M4 Pro Mac mini at the discounted price of $1,279.
text: Time is running out to pick up Apple's M4 Pro Mac mini at the discounted price of $1,279. This Mac mini is a top seller due to its blend of affordability with the performance of the M4 Pro chip. Featuring a 12-core CPU and 16-core GPU, this retail model also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage. Normally $1,399, B&H is knocking $120 off the upgraded configuration (MCX44LL/A) exclusively for AppleInsider readers. Get the exclusive deal While this isn't the only M4 model that's on sale (check out a rundown of the exclusive offers at B&H below and in our M4 Mac mini Price Guide), this configuration is in demand due to the upgraded specs. You also won't have to wait long for the compact desktop to arrive, as B&H is throwing in free 2-day shipping on orders within the contiguous U.S. Exclusive Mac mini deals M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $529* ($70 off) M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $749* ($50 off) M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $769* ($30 off) M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $949* ($50 off) M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,279* ($120 off) M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $1,549* ($50 off) M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $1,929* ($70 off) M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $2,099* ($100 off) M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 64GB RAM, 2TB SSD: $2,799* ($100 off) You must shop through the pricing links above or in our M4 Mac mini Price Guide via a laptop or desktop computer to activate the deals. The offers cannot be activated in the B&H mobile app at this time. You can also find today's best Mac mini deals in our curated roundup. And to learn more about the higher-end model, check out our hands-on M4 Pro Mac mini review.
html:
Time is running out to pick up Apple's M4 Pro Mac mini at the discounted price of $1,279.

This Mac mini is a top seller due to its blend of affordability with the performance of the M4 Pro chip. Featuring a 12-core CPU and 16-core GPU, this retail model also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage. Normally $1,399, B&H is knocking $120 off the upgraded configuration (MCX44LL/A) exclusively for AppleInsider readers.

Get the exclusive deal

While this isn't the only M4 model that's on sale (check out a rundown of the exclusive offers at B&H below and in our M4 Mac mini Price Guide), this configuration is in demand due to the upgraded specs. You also won't have to wait long for the compact desktop to arrive, as B&H is throwing in free 2-day shipping on orders within the contiguous U.S.

Exclusive Mac mini deals

  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $529* ($70 off)
  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $749* ($50 off)
  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $769* ($30 off)
  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $949* ($50 off)
  • M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,279* ($120 off)
  • M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $1,549* ($50 off)
  • M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $1,929* ($70 off)
  • M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $2,099* ($100 off)
  • M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 64GB RAM, 2TB SSD: $2,799* ($100 off)

You must shop through the pricing links above or in our M4 Mac mini Price Guide via a laptop or desktop computer to activate the deals. The offers cannot be activated in the B&H mobile app at this time.

You can also find today's best Mac mini deals in our curated roundup. And to learn more about the higher-end model, check out our hands-on M4 Pro Mac mini review.
